name: Cambly
headline: On-demand access to English tutors over video chat.
description: The Cambly app gives English learners instant 1-on-1 access to friendly native speakers over video chat 24/7. Students get an affordable and convenient way to practice their English and gain confidence. Tutors get to make money helping people from around the world practice English.
generated_description:
**Cambly: English Learning Made Easy**

Cambly is on a straightforward mission: to provide on-demand access to English tutors via video chat, anytime, anywhere. Founded in 2014 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W14, Cambly’s app allows English learners to gain instant, 24/7 access to friendly native speakers. This model not only helps students improve their English skills and build confidence but also offers a flexible income opportunity for tutors worldwide.

### About Cambly
- **Location:** San Francisco
- **Team Size:** Around 200 employees
- **Website:** [cambly.com](http://www.cambly.com)
- **Founders:** The company doesn't detail founders but has notable support from Michael Seibel as their Group Partner.

### What Does Cambly Offer?
Cambly caters to a diverse audience, addressing the unique needs of learners of all ages, from children to business professionals. Here are some of the key offerings:

1. **One-on-One Tutoring:** Instant access to tutors who tailor lessons based on personal goals and interests.
2. **Flexible Scheduling:** Available 24/7, learners can practice conversations at their convenience.
3. **Resource Variety:** Cambly offers courses, resources, and options tailored for kids and businesses, making it an inclusive platform.
4. **Group Lessons:** For a collaborative experience, Cambly provides structured small group sessions that facilitate real-world practice.

### Pricing and Plans
Cambly’s plans are competitive, starting as low as $17/month for small group sessions and $38/month for full private lesson access. They also offer specialized programs for kids and business learners, ensuring a wide range of options depending on individual needs.

### User Experience
Users appreciate Cambly's ethos of embracing mistakes as part of the learning process, fostering a non-judgmental environment. Each lesson reinforces skills and sets personalized activities to help track progress over time.

### Join the Community
Cambly also invites individuals to join its tutor community, allowing them to earn flexible income while helping students worldwide.

### Conclusion
In a world where English proficiency can open doors to new opportunities, Cambly stands as a beacon for learners and tutors alike. It’s a simple yet powerful platform that showcases the magic of real conversations, bridging gaps across cultures one chat at a time.

Whether you're looking to sharpen your English skills or become a tutor, Cambly is your go-to app that transcends traditional learning approaches. Don't just learn—make real progress with Cambly!
